title: Temporal Pulse
subtitle: Contracts in {{year}} — rhythms, spikes, and political cycles

monthlyRhythm.title: Monthly Procurement Rhythm ({{year}})
monthlyRhythm.description: Contract volume by month with risk overlay. December bars highlighted when they exceed the annual average. Click any bar to investigate contracts from that period — December bars show year-end contracts specifically.

decemberAnalysis.title: December Spike Analysis (2018-2024)
decemberAnalysis.description: December contract counts vs average of other months. Years where December exceeds 1.5x are highlighted. Budget-clearing behavior drives predictable year-end surges.

yoyTrend.title: Year-over-Year Contract Volume
yoyTrend.description: Annual contract volume and high-risk rate trends (2002–2025). Click any bar to investigate contracts from that year.

q4Breakdown.title: Q4 vs Q1-Q3 Spend (by Year)
q4Breakdown.description: Q4 spending vs average Q1-Q3 monthly spend per year. A ratio > 3× indicates systematic end-of-year budget dumps.

sectorDecember.title: December Rush by Sector
sectorDecember.description: Percentage of each sector's annual contracts awarded in December. Sectors above 15% show systematic year-end budget pressure.
